flawed_nl_solution:
After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=15>>15 more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3.0>>3.0 ceilings.
Michelangelo will have 15-3.0=<<15-3.0=12.0>>12.0 more ceilings to paint.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
